newsitem.title: USA: WMS to spin off Midway Games stake.
newsitem.headline: WMS to spin off Midway Games stake.

text.p: WMS Industries Inc said Monday its directors had authorized a spinoff to shareholders of its 33.4 million shares of Midway Games Inc, representing an 86.8 percent interest in Midway.
WMS said it believes Midway's stock price has been hurt by its relatively small public share float and because arbitrageurs have purchased WMS shares while establishing a short position in Midway.
Therefore, Midway's desire to grow its business, in part through acquisitions, may be enhanced by the spinoff, WMS said.
WMS also said it believes the spinoff will reduce regulatory burdens by separating ownership of Midway's business from WMS's gaming device business.
The spinoff will be done on a pro rata basis to WMS stockholders

Assuming that no options are exercised prior to the record date for the proposed spinoff, and that WMS's outstanding convertible debentures are not converted prior to such record date, the spinoff will result in the distribution to WMS stockholders of 1.38 shares of Midway for each outstanding share of WMS, WMS said.
